title: Condition & Style, Steps to Piedmont Ave.
map_address: 138 Monte Cresta Ave near Kelton Ct.
posting_body: ['Old world charm with modern functionality', 'Entire building is renovated in recent year while classic details are being preserved', 'Fully renovated gourmet kitchen: Gas Stove, Stainless Steel appliances, Dish Washer, Granite Countertop', 'Open kitchen to living room', 'Hardwood Floor, Large Windows, High Ceiling, Good lighting', 'Gorgeously landscaped yard front and back', 'Backyard outdoor living space, equipped with chairs, tables, and BBQ', 'Great for entertaining or just chill', 'Steps to Piedmont Ave.', 'Close to Bart stations', 'Easy access to freeway', 'Gated garage parking', 'Pet Policy: No to Dogs, Yes to Cats', 'Monthly rent: $2,395/month', 'This rent amount reflects a 1 month free applied for the signing of a 1 year lease', '1 month free is spread over 12 months:', '2,613 X 11 / 12 = 2,395', 'You pay $2,395/month', 'Heat, water, and garbage included', 'Security Deposit $3,600', 'Gated Garage Parking', '$125/mon', 'if available', 'Showings upon request', 'Email to Gigi:', '138montecresta@gmai']
